meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ornate.
meanings.sent1: The ornatenesses of the room's decorations impressed the guests.
meanings.sent2: The ornatenesses of the jewelry made it stand out.
meanings.sent3: The ornatenesses of the cake's frosting made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was filled with ornatenesses, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The ornatenesses of the garden were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being elaborately or excessively decorated.
meanings.sent1: The ornatenesses of the costume caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The ornatenesses of the building's architecture were breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The ornatenesses of the gift wrapping made it almost too pretty to open.
meanings.sent4: The ornatenesses of the chandelier made the room feel like a royal palace.
meanings.sent5: The ornatenesses of the parade floats were a feast for the eyes.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being adorned with intricate details.
meanings.sent1: The ornatenesses of the tapestry revealed the skill of the weaver.
meanings.sent2: The ornatenesses of the embroidery added charm to the pillow.
meanings.sent3: The ornatenesses of the clock's design made it a conversation piece.
meanings.sent4: The ornatenesses of the necklace sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The ornatenesses of the carvings on the door were mesmerizing.
